intro: You will now be asked to perform two walks of two minutes each.||• The first at a normal walking pace|• The second as fast as you can safely walk
Wear the shoes you normally wear when you walk.||You should NOT wear slippers.||Use a walking aid (such as a cane or walker) if you need one.
Find a long room or hallway (about 30 feet).||Make sure the path is clear.
Walk back and forth along your walking path.
Tap the Cancel button if you need to start over.
STOP walking if you have chest pain or difficulty breathing.

When you are ready, tap Start. You will hear a countdown and a starting horn.||Put the phone in your front pants pocket, or carry it in your hand.||Walk at your usual pace for 2 minutes; the phone will alert you when time is up.
